title: BarbieCasino
author: BarbieCasino
content: NOTE:1 GNTO is equal to 1$: every participates must join the GOLDENUgget official Telegram Group and if you have any question about bounty in your Mind so please join the GOLDENUgget Bounty Telegram Group.AND must qoute your weekly report thanks.   Red trusted account and altaccount not allowed It is advised to all the participants to comment here to confirm after you fill the form. Thanks GOLDENUgget Facebook Campaign Rules• To join it you must Like, Follow, and share our page GOLDENUgget• Your profile must have 250 public followers/friends to participate.• The number of followers/friends will be that which is registered at the time of application• You must share at least 3 posts from the page per week and create 2 posts AND 2 comments about GOLDENUgget with a link to GOLDENUgget website• Only one account per person is allowedBounty Rewards• 250-750 friends 50 GNTOCOIN/week• 750-4000 friends 100 GNTOCOIN/week• Above than 4000 friends 150 GNTOCOIN/weekHow To Join• Fill the form here FORM• Spreadsheet• Comment your proof of work in the following format: Code:Week #1FacebookShares + posts + COMMENT 1.2.3.4.5.6.7. GOLDENUgget Twitter Campaign RULES• Follow GOLDENUgget Twitter GOLDENUgget• Must having a minimum 250 followers and make your page public.• The number of followers will be that which is registered at the time of application• Retweet at least 3 tweets from the page per week at different days and make 2 tweets in your own words with a link and hashtags to GOLDENUgget.• Only one account per person is allowedBounty Rewards• 250-750 followers = 50 GNTOCOIN/week• 750-4000 followers = 100 GNTOCOIN/week• Above than 4000 followers = 150 GNTOCOIN/weekHow To Join• Fill the form here FORM• Spreadsheet• Comment your proof of work in the following format:Code:Week #1TwitterRetweets + Tweets1.2.3.4.5. GOLDENUgget Blogging, Video, PR Campaign We divide all kinds of content, including articles, blog posts, videos into 3 categories:Excellent -  150/GNTOCOINSVery good - 100 /GNTOCOINSGood- 50 /GNTOCOINSRules1. You can use our official images, logos, graphics on our website and in the ANN stream 2. The article must be at least 500 characters long and must be original3. An article or video must contain at least 1 link to our website, Whitepaper or an ANN thread 4. Blogging platforms such as Medium, Steemit, Reddit, etc accept only 2 messages from one user 5. Your blogs on platforms like Medium, Steemit, Reddit, or personal blogs, must have at least 250 followers6. At least one link to your BTT profile must be included in the article or description of the video to confirm your authorship How To Join• Fill the form here FORM• SpreadsheetCode:Bitcointalk username :Publication link :Eth addtess : GOLDENUgget Youtube Video Creation Campaign Rules• Create the video with unique contents and upload to Youtube.• Your Video must mention and discuss the GOLDENUgget ICO Project with a link to the website.• Mention the link https://www.goldenugget.ch/ in the description of the video, along with your bitcointalk profile link to recognize your content• The length of the video must be longer than 1.30 minute Bounty Rewards• 100–500 views =  50  GNTOCOINS• 501–1000 views  = 80  GNTOCOINS• 1001–2000 views =  100  GNTOCOINS• 2001–5000 views =    150 GNTOCOINS• More than 5000 views = 200  GNTOCOINSHow To Join• Fill the form here FORM• SpreadsheetCode:Bitcointalk username :youtube video link :Eth addtess :  GOLDENUgget Translation Campaign Whitepaper and ANN thread: •   العربية (Arabic)•   Indonesian•   Español (Spanish)•   中文 (Chinese)•   Hrvatski (Croatian)•   Deutsch (German)•   Eλληνικά (Greek)•   עברית (Hebrew)•   Français•   India•   Italiano (Italian)•   日本語 (Japanese)•   Nederlands (Dutch)•   한국어 (Korean)•   Philippines•   Polski•   Português (Portuguese)•   Pyccкий (Russian)•   Română (Romanian)•   Skandinavisk•   Türkçe (Turkish)Bounty Rewards• Whitepaper translation- 800 GNTOCOINS• ANN thread translation- 500 GNTOCOINSHow To Join• Fill the form here FORM• Spreadsheet GOLDENUgget Telegram Campaign Rules1) Join our Telegram group:TELEGRAM GROUP 2) Write a constructive message immediately after you join. You can write an interesting question, comment. It should not just be "Hello", "Wow" or "How are you?";3)Fill the form here FORM[ftp]][ftp][ftp][/ftp][/ftp][/ftp]]Spreadsheet4) Submit your proof of ownership in this thread with the following formatting:Code:Bitcointalk username :Telegram username :Eth addtess :
